__e: They said black. It's grey. It's a different vehicle.
- Just need proof of current registration and $150 and we'll release the car to you.
Dawns are always gray, and the days... can have different colors. But the nights are black.
I just took the grayest shower of my life.
I swear, if the title to this car was in my name...
You'll see naught but gray water on a day like this.
